document.masterDocTitle: Review of Michalowskiya Dworakowska (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae: Dikraneurini) with description of six new species from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of Michalowskiya Dworakowska (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae: Dikraneurini) with description of six new species from China

paragraph.keyLead:
1 Penis with developed dorsoatrium and preatrium, connective manubrium bilobate not dilated, penis stem flanked by lateral processes arising from atrial rim..............................................
M. (Burunra) sordida Dworakowska

- Penis without developed dorsoatrium and preatrium, connective manubrium dilated, penis stem flanked by lateral processes arising basally........................................................................................ 2
2 Paramere central lobe broadened distinctly and apical part short................................................. 3
- Paramere central lobe broadened slightly and apical part long................................................... 7

3 Penis with pair of apical processes................................................. M . ( M. )
minuta Mann & Sohi

4 Penis stem with one pair of short processes near midlength................................... M . ( M. )
pedata
sp. nov.

5 Basal processes arising from preatrium, very short and slightly extended beyond base of stem.................................................................................................... M . ( M. )
variabilis Dworakowska
- Basal processes arising near base of penis stem, long and reaching level of gonopore................................ 6

6 Penis stem broad in lateral view, lateral basal processes of penis curved cephalad........ M . ( M. )
sikkimensis Dworakowska

- Penis stem slim in lateral view, lateral basal processes of penis not curved cephalad........ M . ( M. )
taiwana Dworakowska

8 Penis stem with one pair of sclerotized processes....................................... M. ( M. )
biprocessa
sp. nov.

- Penis stem with two pairs of sclerotized processes............................... M . ( M. )
quadrispina Dworakowska

9 Penis basal processes as long as 2 / 3 of stem........................................ M. ( M. )
breviprocessa
sp. nov.
- Penis basal processes longer than or equal to stem............................................................ 9

10 Penis stem extending dorsad at 1 / 3 of base.......................................... M. ( M. )
longiprocessa
sp. nov.

11 Penis stem compressed antero-posteriorly............................................ M . ( M. )
lutea Dworakowska

12 Penis stem apical part expanded dorsad, broadened basad................................ M. ( M. )
aurantiaca
sp. nov.

- Penis stem apical part expanded ventrad, not broadened basad.......................... M. ( M. )
brownistriata
sp. nov.

Distribution: China (Yunnan, Guizhou, Hunan, Zhejiang, Fujian).
